holidays.name: New Year's Day
holidays.message: Start the new year with high-flying fun! Our bounce houses are the perfect way to give your New Year's celebration an extra bounce of excitement.
holidays.promoDescription: Ring in 2025 with our exclusive New Year's package! Rent any bounce house and get a 30L Double Tank Slush Machine at 25% off. Perfect for creating both kid-friendly slushies and adult celebratory drinks to countdown to midnight!

holidays.name: Valentine's Day
holidays.message: Bounce into someone's heart this Valentine's Day! Our heart-shaped and pink bounce houses will add a special touch of love and fun to your celebration.
holidays.promoDescription: Express your love with our Valentine's special! Rent our Pink Bounce Castle and receive a Cotton Candy Machine for just $25 more. Create sweet memories with pink vanilla cotton candy that matches your bouncer!

holidays.name: St. Patrick's Day
holidays.message: Feel the luck of the Irish with our festive bounce houses! They're more fun than finding a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.
holidays.promoDescription: Get lucky this St. Patrick's Day! Book our Lime Water Slide and receive a free table and chairs set. Plus, add our 15L Single Tank Slush Machine for just $50 more to create green festive drinks!

holidays.name: Easter
holidays.message: Hop into Easter fun with our bounce houses! They're the perfect addition to your Easter egg hunt and springtime celebration.
holidays.promoDescription: Make your Easter celebration hop with joy! Book any bounce house and receive a free Children's Table and Chair Set for the little ones' Easter crafts and egg decorating. Perfect for creating a complete kids' activity zone!

holidays.name: Cinco de Mayo
holidays.message: ¡Olé! Celebrate Cinco de Mayo with a festive bounce house fiesta that will have everyone jumping with joy!
holidays.promoDescription: ¡Viva la fiesta! Book any our Tropical units and get 50% off our Snow Cone Machine with three festive flavors. Add a Slush Machine for authentic margaritas (for adults) at just $75 more!

holidays.name: Mother's Day
holidays.message: Give Mom what she really wants this Mother's Day – kids having fun (and burning energy) in a bounce house while she relaxes!
holidays.promoDescription: Treat mom to real relaxation! Book any bounce house or water slide and add a Cotton Candy Machine at half price. We'll include 2 extra hours of rental time FREE so mom can truly enjoy her special day!

holidays.name: Memorial Day
holidays.message: Kick off summer the right way with a patriotic bounce house for your Memorial Day cookout! Red, white, and bounce for everyone.
holidays.promoDescription: Salute the start of summer! Book our Blue Double Lane Waterslide and get a Popcorn Machine absolutely FREE. Perfect for backyard barbecues and honoring the holiday while keeping cool!

holidays.name: Father's Day
holidays.message: Dad will love watching the kids have a blast in one of our awesome bounce houses – and he might just join in the fun too!
holidays.promoDescription: Give Dad what he really wants - family fun and great food! Rent any water slide and receive a Popcorn Machine at 50% off. Add our generator for just $25 more if you're planning a park celebration!

holidays.name: Independence Day
holidays.message: Make your 4th of July celebration explode with fun! Our patriotic bounce houses are the perfect addition to your family cookout.
holidays.promoDescription: Celebrate America with our patriotic package! Rent the Blue Inflatable Castle with Slide AND receive any Slush Machine at 50% off. Create red, white, and blue slushies for the perfect Independence Day refreshments!

holidays.name: Summer Kickoff
holidays.message: School's out for summer! Celebrate with our water slide inflatables and bounce houses for the ultimate summer vacation party.
holidays.promoDescription: School's out special! Book any of our water slides and get a Snow Cone Machine for just $25 more. Stay cool all day with this perfect summer combo - ideal for birthday parties and neighborhood gatherings!

holidays.name: Back to School
holidays.message: Squeeze in one last adventure before the school bell rings! Our bounce houses are the perfect way to end summer vacation with a bang.
holidays.promoDescription: Send summer off with a bang! Book our TALL Red Water Slide or Tropical Water Slide and receive a free Cotton Candy Machine rental. Make those last summer memories extra sweet before the school year begins!

holidays.name: Labor Day
holidays.message: Say goodbye to summer with one last bounce! Our inflatable rentals are the perfect way to celebrate Labor Day weekend.
holidays.promoDescription: End summer with the ultimate party! Book any water slide for your Labor Day celebration and get any Slush Machine at 50% off. Keep the whole family cool and refreshed during the long weekend!

holidays.name: Halloween
holidays.message: Bounce-tacular Halloween fun awaits! Our spooky-themed bounce houses are a monster hit at any Halloween party or fall festival.
holidays.promoDescription: Treat, no tricks! Book our Red or White Large Castles with Slides and get a Popcorn Machine OR Cotton Candy Machine for the free! Perfect for Halloween parties and fall festivals to keep the little monsters happy!

holidays.name: Thanksgiving
holidays.message: Keep the kids entertained while the turkey cooks! Our bounce houses are the perfect way to work up an appetite for that Thanksgiving feast.
holidays.promoDescription: Keep the kids busy while the turkey cooks! Rent any bounce house and receive 2 free tables and 12 chairs to go with. Perfect for setting up a kids' activity zone while adults prepare the Thanksgiving feast!

holidays.name: Hanukkah
holidays.message: Eight nights of bouncing joy! Celebrate Hanukkah with an inflatable that will have everyone jumping with holiday spirit.
holidays.promoDescription: Celebrate the Festival of Lights! Rent our White Bouncer or Balloon Bouncer and receive a Popcorn Machine rental at 50% off. Add a Popcorn Machine for just $25 more to complete your Hanukkah celebration!

holidays.name: Christmas
holidays.message: Make spirits bright with a festive bounce house! Santa's elves approve of our Christmas-themed inflatables for your holiday gathering.
holidays.promoDescription: Ho-ho-ho! Book our Large White Combo with Slide (perfect for a winter wonderland theme) and get a cotton candy machine with 50 services FREE! Snack on cotton candy and candy canes for the kids at your Christmas celebration!
